body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting Dream Wheels car dealership. My name is Philip Moore and I'll be assisting you today. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Amber. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm having a billing issue with my recent car purchase.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'm sorry to hear that, Amber. To assist you further, could you please provide me with the invoice number and the date of purchase?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, the invoice number is five zero two three and the purchase was made on the first of September.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for providing that information, Amber. Let me look into this matter for you.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I appreciate your patience. It seems there was an error in the billing system. We will rectify this immediately and ensure a corrected invoice is resent to you.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Thank you for your prompt attention to this matter. I appreciate it.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Amber. If you have any further questions or concerns, please don't hesitate to reach out. Thank you for choosing Dream Wheels car dealership. Have a great day!
